intro: Where I walk and jump with the arrow keys...
... tap 'up' in the air to float.
And use 'WASD' to block with my umbrella.
And absolutely don't try to block fire.
Don't even think about touching fire with my umbrella.
Time to do what I'm here for: rescue umbrellas from trauma!
stage2_1: [color=#a70b0b][shake rate=5 level=10]I will undo with my own hands![/shake][/color]
stage2_2: The world shall burn with my [shake rate=5 level=10][color=#a70b0b]rage[/color][/shake].
stage3_2: You have [color=#5ebc19]another umbrella[/color] now, I'm sure.
While [color=#5ebc19]I get buried deeper[/color] in the pile of trash in your basement!
stage4_1:
... I wish to go back.
... [color=#0c1699]only tears now[/color].

...meant nothing to you...
...[color=#a70b0b]want to tear it all down.[/color]
stage4_2: Thinking about how you threw me away [color=#0c1699]hurts[/color] so much.
Almost as much as [color=#a70b0b][shake rate=5 level=10]I want to hurt you[/shake][/color]!
stage5_2: I was assured I was the best umbrella.
We were going to watch your children grow up, [color=#9a248d]together[/color].
I would have kept your grandchildren dry.
SO WHY AM I IN THE DUMPSTER?????
outro: I will take you to a place, where you can feed on humen's fears.
Together, we can perform the ultimate Karakasa technique!
And thus Kogasa invented the 'Forgotten Umbrella's Night Train' spellcard.
